snippet.title: Trials Evolution - Riders of Doom Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Visit the official Website: http://trials.ubi.com/trials-evolution/
Join us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/trials.official

Trials Evolution is back with an awesome new DLC! Riders of Doom is the second DLC for Trials Evolution, the award-winning Xbox LIVE Arcade game.

Some say the Mayans predicted that the world would end in December, 2012. What they did not predict was the coming of the four motorcyclists of the apocalypse -- the RIDERS OF DOOM!

Packed with content and new ways to play, Riders of Doom blows open the doors of the Trials with more content than ever seen before!
